description: Navigate to a target location and return to the original starting position.
example_command: Go to the supply station at (8, 8) and then return to base.

description: Visit several specific coordinates in a sequence to patrol an area.
example_command: Move to (2, 8), then (8, 8), and finally (8, 2) to check the perimeter.

description: Move in a staggered pattern to cover a specific area of the 2D grid.
example_command: Perform a zig-zag search by moving to (2, 2), (2, 4), (8, 4), and (8, 6).

description: Stop at multiple drop-off points in a specific order.
example_command: Drop off packages at (4, 1), (5, 5), and then head to the exit at (9, 9).

description: Move to a point specifically chosen to 'loop' around a central obstacle.
example_command: Go around the center by passing through (5, 8) before reaching the goal at (10, 10).
